card.name: Ixxyxli Fixfinger
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Each other Martian creature gets +1 armor.

card.name: Yantzee Gang
card.property: Action: Steal 1A.
“This hand’s not gonna fill itself.” ”It might, though.” ”Stow it Clyde; I’m working a bit here!”

card.name: Silver Key Imp
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Players cannot forge their second key.

card.name: Cull the Weak
card.property: Play: Destroy the least powerful enemy creature.

card.name: Oubliette
card.property: Play: Purge a creature with power 3 or lower.
“I forgot we had this down here!”

card.name: Grump Buggy
card.property: Your opponent’s keys cost +1A for each friendly creature with power 5 or higher. Your keys cost +1A for each enemy creature with power 5 or higher.

card.name: Total Recall
card.property: Play: For each friendly ready creature, gain 1A. Return each friendly creature to your hand.

card.name: Into the Fray
card.property: Play: For the remainder of the turn, a friendly Brobnar creature gains, “Fight: Ready this creature.”

card.name: Gauntlet of Command
card.property: Action: Ready and fight with a friendly creature.
“I said ‘take me to your leader’ and got a fist to the face.” – Captain Val Jericho

card.name: Æmberspine Mongrel
card.property: Hazardous 3. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 3D to the attacking enemy.) After your opponent uses a creature to reap, gain 1A.

card.name: Titan Librarian
card.property: At the end of your turn, if Titan Librarian is not on a flank, archive a card.
Titan Fabrication Labs: Building a Bigger Tomorrow.

card.name: Gamgee
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: If your opponent has more A than you, steal 1A.

card.name: Eyegor
card.property: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the others.

card.name: Quantum Fingertrap
card.property: Action: Swap the positions of two creatures in a battleline.
So if you push forward in space, and I pull backward in time…

card.name: Hidden Stash
card.property: Play: Archive a card.
“Now, where did you put that...”

card.name: Yxlyx Stimrager
card.property: Fight: Deal 2D to a creature and move it to either flank of its controller’s battleline.

card.name: Sack of Coins
card.property: Play: Deal 1D to a creature for each A in your pool.
“The Svarr are masters of improvised weaponry.” – Toothless Jakk

card.name: Aubade the Grim
card.property: Play: Capture 3A. Reap: Discard 1A from Aubade the Grim.

card.name: Camouflage
card.property: Creatures not on a flank cannot fight this creature.
“We found it while searching through the Kurnois Bog for a superior duck.” – Dr. Escotera

card.name: Tremor
card.property: Play: Stun a creature and each of its neighbors.

card.name: Groke
card.property: Fight: Your opponent loses 1A.
“Fierce as a Brutodon and about as sharp.” – Livia the Elder

card.name: Subtle Maul
card.property: Action: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

card.name: The Sting
card.property: Skip your “forge a key” step. You get all A spent by your opponent when forging keys. Action: Sacrifice The Sting.

card.name: Niffle Grounds
card.property: Action: Choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, that creature loses taunt and elusive.
“Welp, we’re niffled.” – Captain Val Jericho

card.name: Streke
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) While Streke is not on a flank, your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card during their “draw cards” step.

card.name: Fanghouse
card.property: Assault 3. (Before this creature attacks, deal 3D to the attacked enemy.) Hazardous 3. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 3D to the attacking enemy.)

card.name: Remote Access
card.property: Play: Use an opponent’s artifact as if it were yours.

card.name: Lash of Broken Dreams
card.property: Action: Keys cost +3A during your opponent’s next turn.
“At first, I thought that nothing could harm an Archon.” – Captain Val Jericho

card.name: Brend the Fanatic
card.property: Skirmish. Play: Your opponent gains 1A. Destroyed: Steal 3A.
“Here, hold this.”

card.name: Grasping Vines
card.property: Play: Return up to 3 artifacts to their owners’ hands.

card.name: Dusk Chronicles
card.property: Play: If your opponent has more A than you, draw a card. If you have more A than your opponent, archive a card.
”I know it was right here… right before the Midnight Chronicles.”

card.name: Rock-Hurling Giant
card.property: During your turn, each time you discard a Brobnar card from your hand, you may deal 4D to a creature.

card.name: Coward’s End
card.property: Play: Destroy each undamaged creature. Gain 3 chains.

card.name: King of the Crag
card.property: Each enemy Brobnar creature gets –2 power.
Overthrowing this king is an uphill battle.

card.name: Binate Rupture
card.property: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Each player gains A equal to the A in their pool.

card.name: Lamindra
card.property: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Lamindra’s neighbors gain elusive.

card.name: Seraphic Armor
card.property: This creature gets +1 armor. Play: Fully heal this creature.

card.name: Way of the Porcupine
card.property: This creature gains Hazardous 3. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 3D to the attacking enemy.)
“How do you put it on?” ”Very carefully.”

card.name: Healing Blast
card.property: Play: Fully heal a creature. If you healed 4 or more damage this way, gain 2A.

card.name: Shadows Ambassador
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Fight/Reap: You may play or use a Shadows card this turn.
“Greetings! I bring… Hello?”

card.name: Marmo Swarm
card.property: Marmo Swarm gets +1 power for each A in your pool.

card.name: Interdimensional Graft
card.property: Play: If an opponent forges a key on their next turn, they must give you their remaining A.

card.name: Misery Exploit
card.property: Play: Gain 1A for each damaged enemy creature.

card.name: Mindwarper
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Action: Choose an enemy creature. It captures 1A from its own side.

card.name: Orbital Bombardment
card.property: Play: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand. For each card revealed this way, deal 2D to a creature. (You may choose a different creature each time.)

card.name: Collar of Subordination
card.property: You control this creature.
“OBEY.”

card.name: Martyr’s End
card.property: Play: Destroy any number of friendly creatures. Gain 1A for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Barrister Joya
card.property: Enemy creatures cannot reap.
“A righteous law will enforce itself.”

card.name: The Flex
card.property: Play: Choose a ready friendly Brobnar creature. Exhaust it and gain A equal to half its power (rounding down the gain).

card.name: Titan Mechanic
card.property: While Titan Mechanic is on a flank, each key costs –1A.
If they come, they will build it.

card.name: Epic Quest
card.property: Play: Archive each friendly Knight creature in play. Omni: If you have played 7 or more Sanctum cards this turn, sacrifice Epic Quest and forge a key at no cost.

card.name: Little Niff
card.property: Omega. Deploy. Elusive. After a neighbor of Little Niff is used to fight, steal 1A.

card.name: Curiosity
card.property: Play: Destroy each Scientist creature.
“It started with Schrödinger’s cat and just kept going from there.” – Quixo the “Adventurer”

card.name: Cutthroat Research
card.property: Play: Steal 2A if your opponent has 8A or more.
“To steal data from one person is plagiarism. To steal from many is research.” – Dr. Escotera

card.name: Phoenix Heart
card.property: This creature gains, “Destroyed: Return this creature to its owner’s hand and deal 3D to each creature in play.”

card.name: Harland Mindlock
card.property: Play: Take control of an enemy flank creature until Harland Mindlock leaves play.

card.name: Binding Irons
card.property: Play: Your opponent gains 3 chains.
“I will not chain you. You have already chained yourself through your blind affection for these mortals.” — Judge Slenderwile, Archon

card.name: Redlock
card.property: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) At the end of your turn, if you did not play any creatures this turn, gain 1A.

card.name: Soldiers to Flowers
card.property: Play: Purge each Untamed creature from each player’s discard pile. For each card purged this way, its owner gains 1A.

card.name: Yxilx Dominator
card.property: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) Yxilx Dominator enters play stunned.
Core power online. Stand by for domination.

card.name: Tentacus
card.property: Your opponent must pay you 1A in order to use an artifact.

card.name: Grommid
card.property: You cannot play creatures. After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Grommid, your opponent loses 1A.

card.name: Special Delivery
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Special Delivery. Deal 3D to a flank creature. If this damage destroys that creature, purge it.

card.name: Poke
card.property: Play: Deal 1D to an enemy creature. If this damage destroys that creature, draw a card.

card.name: Brammo
card.property: Play: Deal 2D to each enemy flank creature.
“Is that short for Brammunition?” – Dodger

card.name: Labwork
card.property: Play: Archive a card.
Attention to detail is the key to all progress.

card.name: The Warchest
card.property: Action: Gain 1A for each enemy creature that was destroyed in a fight this turn.
It doesn’t matter what the treasure is, only how it was won.

card.name: Furtive Investors
card.property: Play: If your opponent has more A than you, gain 1A for each key your opponent has forged.

card.name: Replicator
card.property: Reap: Trigger the reap effect of another creature in play as if you controlled that creature. (That creature does not exhaust.)

card.name: Shard of Hate
card.property: Action: Stun an enemy creature for each friendly Shard.
Forged from fear.

card.name: Lollop the Titanic
card.property: Lollop the Titanic deals no damage when attacked.
“Titans are to giants as giants are to goblins.” – Dr. Schucks

card.name: Charette
card.property: Play: Capture 3A.
It doesn’t like to share.

card.name: Tantadlin
card.property: Tantadlin only deals 2D when fighting. Fight: Discard a random card from your opponent’s archives.
“Were you gonna eat that?”

card.name: Whistling Darts
card.property: Play: Deal 1D to each enemy creature.
Do, Rei, Mi, AHHH!

card.name: Fetchdrones
card.property: Action: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. For each Logos card discarded this way, a friendly creature captures 2A.

card.name: Glyxl Proliferator
card.property: Reap: If Glyxl Proliferator is on a flank, archive a Mars card from your discard pile.

card.name: Golden Aura
card.property: Play: Choose a creature. Fully heal the chosen creature. For the remainder of the turn, the chosen creature is considered to be in house Sanctum and cannot be dealt damage.

card.name: Nyzyk Resonator
card.property: For each neighbor Nyzyk Resonator has, your opponent’s keys cost +2A.

card.name: Fila the Researcher
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) After a creature is played adjacent to Fila the Researcher, draw a card.

card.name: Mars First
card.property: Play: Ready and use a friendly Mars creature.
“Mars second, third, and fourth, too, if you ask me.” – Ulyq Megamouth

card.name: Smite
card.property: Play: Ready and fight with a friendly creature. Deal 2D to the attacked creature’s neighbors.

card.name: Grovekeeper
card.property: At the end of your turn, give each neighboring creature a +1 power counter.

card.name: Perilous Wild
card.property: Play: Destroy each elusive creature.
The Architects took great pains to make the Crucible inhabitable for creatures from worlds across the universe. But they didn’t make it safe.

card.name: Prince Derric, Unifier
card.property: Play: Gain 3A if you control creatures from 3 different houses.
“Ah, excellent! My father will be pleased.”

card.name: Pip Pip
card.property: After an enemy creature reaps, stun it.
“A lead foot? I’ll give ‘em a lead foot.”

card.name: Bonerot Venom
card.property: After this creature is used, deal 2D to it.
“Oh, no! My bones!” – Quixo the ”Adventurer”

card.name: Vezyma Thinkdrone
card.property: Reap: You may archive a friendly creature or artifact from play.
Nothing helps me think like wanton destruction.

card.name: Ronnie Wristclocks
card.property: Play: Steal 1A. If your opponent has 7A or more, steal 2A instead.
“You look like an Archon with discriminating tastes.”

card.name: Selwyn the Fence
card.property: Fight/Reap: Move 1A from one of your cards to your pool.

card.name: Lethal Distraction
card.property: Play: Choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, whenever this creature takes damage, it takes an additional 2D.
“Again? Ya’ kiddin’ me?”

card.name: Smith
card.property: Play: Gain 2A if you control more creatures than your opponent.

card.name: Regrowth
card.property: Play: Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand.
“Deep in the heart of every bear, one can find...another bear.” – Dr. Escotera

card.name: Teliga
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a creature, gain 1A.
“Don’t try to change the Crucible to suit your needs. Let it change you.”

card.name: Persistence Hunting
card.property: Play: Choose a house. Exhaust each enemy creature of the chosen house.

card.name: Glimmer
card.property: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Shadow of Dis
card.property: Play: Until your next turn, enemy creatures’ text boxes are considered blank (except for traits).

card.name: Storm Crawler
card.property: Storm Crawler only deals 1D when fighting. After an enemy creature reaps, stun it.

card.name: Backup Copy
card.property: This creature gains, “Destroyed: Put this creature on top of your deck.”
”It’s so cute! I want another one.” – Dextre

card.name: Earthbind
card.property: This creature cannot be used unless its controller has discarded a card this turn.

card.name: Might Makes Right
card.property: Play: You may sacrifice any number of creatures with total power of 25 or more. If you do, forge a key at no cost.

card.name: Jargogle
card.property: Elusive. Play: Put a card from your hand facedown under Jargogle. Destroyed: If it is your turn, play the card under Jargogle; otherwise, archive that card.

card.name: The Grey Rider
card.property: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) Play/Fight/Reap: You may ready and fight with a neighboring creature.

card.name: Swindle
card.property: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.) Play: Steal 3A.

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.property: Play: Ready and fight with up to 3 different friendly creatures, one at a time.

card.name: Æmber Imp
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) After a creature reaps, stun it.
“Even the rocks themselves suffer here.” – Eldest Bear

card.name: Library of the Damned
card.property: Action: Archive a card.
”This place takes the idea of losing yourself in a book to a whole new level.” – Doc Bookton

card.name: Panpaca, Jaga
card.property: Skirmish. Creatures to the left of Panpaca, Jaga in the battleline gain skirmish.
“Light wolf, stole a hen, to the left and start again.” – from “Panpaca”, children’s game

card.name: Longfused Mines
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Longfused Mines. Deal 3D to each enemy creature not on a flank.

card.name: Memory Chip
card.property: After you choose Logos as your active house, archive a card.

card.name: Extinction
card.property: Play: Choose a creature. Destroy that creature and each creature that shares a trait with it. Gain 1 chain.

card.name: Miasma
card.property: Play: Your opponent skips the “forge a key” step on their next turn.

card.name: Not Finished with You
card.property: Play: Shuffle any number of creatures from your discard pile into your deck.

card.name: Nightforge
card.property: Play: If you have not forged a key this turn, you may forge a key at +4A current cost.

card.name: A Fair Game
card.property: Play: Discard the top card of your opponent’s deck and reveal their hand. You gain 1A for each card of the discarded card’s house revealed this way. Your opponent repeats the preceding effect on you.

card.name: Blood Money
card.property: Play: Place 2A from the common supply on an enemy creature.
“You! Æmber lover. You’re next.”

card.name: Brain Stem Antenna
card.property: This creature gains, “After you play a Mars creature, ready this creature and for the remainder of the turn it belongs to house Mars.”

card.name: Skeleton Key
card.property: Action: A friendly creature captures 1A.
Skeleton sold separately.

card.name: Qyxxlyx Plague Master
card.property: Fight/Reap: Deal 3D to each Human creature. This damage cannot be prevented by armor.

card.name: Combat Pheromones
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Combat Pheromones. You may use up to 2 other Mars cards this turn.
“Don’t worry, this will only sting a lot.”

card.name: Mars Ambassador
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Fight/Reap: You may play or use a Mars card this turn.
“Greetings! I bring mad tidings.”

card.name: Duma the Martyr
card.property: Destroyed: Fully heal each other friendly creature and draw 2 cards.
“Remember me.” – Squire Duma, at the Battle for the Gate of Hope

card.name: Sucker Punch
card.property: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Deal 2D to an enemy creature. If that creature is destroyed by this effect, archive Sucker Punch.

card.name: Gorm of Omm
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Gorm of Omm. Destroy an artifact.
“An object, no matter how sacred, is just a thing.”

card.name: Untamed Ambassador
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Fight/Reap: You may play or use an Untamed card this turn.
“I bring tidings.”

card.name: Library of Babble
card.property: Action: Draw a card.
When you make an archive of all knowledge in the universe, don’t be surprised when you understand almost none of it.

card.name: Free Markets
card.property: Play: Gain 1A (to a maximum of 6) for each house represented among cards in play, except for Sanctum.

card.name: The Harder They Come
card.property: Play: Purge a creature with power 5 or higher.

card.name: Abond the Armorsmith
card.property: Other friendly creatures get +1 armor. Action: For the remainder of the turn, other friendly creatures get +1 armor.

card.name: Tireless Crocag
card.property: Tireless Crocag cannot reap. You may use Tireless Crocag as if it belonged to the active house. If your opponent has no creatures in play, destroy Tireless Crocag.

card.name: Director of Z.Y.X.
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) At the start of your turn, archive the top card of your deck.

card.name: Nature’s Call
card.property: Play: Return up to 3 creatures to their owners’ hands.
“Gotta go, gotta go, gotta go...”

card.name: Master the Theory
card.property: Play: If there are no friendly creatures in play, you may archive a card for each enemy creature.
In theory, there is no difference between theory and practice.

card.name: Shard of Hope
card.property: Action: A friendly creature captures 1A for each friendly Shard.
Forged from confidence.

card.name: Collector Worm
card.property: Fight: Archive the creature Collector Worm fights. If that creature leaves your archives, put it in its owner’s hand instead.

card.name: Grumpus Tamer
card.property: Reap: Search your deck and discard pile for a War Grumpus, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

card.name: Oath of Poverty
card.property: Play: Destroy each of your artifacts. Gain 2A for each artifact destroyed this way.

card.name: Destructive Analysis
card.property: Play: Deal 2D to a creature. You may purge any number of cards from your archives to deal an additional 2D to the same creature for each card purged this way.

card.name: Drummernaut
card.property: Play/Fight/Reap: Return another friendly Giant creature to your hand.
“Ain’t nothin’, ain’t nobody, that can beat my beat.”

card.name: Neutron Shark
card.property: Play/Fight/Reap: Destroy an enemy creature or artifact and a friendly creature or artifact. Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is not a Logos card, trigger this effect again.

card.name: Sample Collection
card.property: Play: Put an enemy creature into your archives for each key your opponent has forged. If any of these creatures leave your archives, they are put into their owner’s hand instead.

card.name: 1-2 Punch
card.property: Play: Stun an enemy creature. If that creature was already stunned, destroy it instead.
Giants can count past two, but why bother?

card.name: Deipno Spymaster
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Omni: Choose a friendly creature. You may use that creature this turn.

card.name: Fogbank
card.property: Play: Your opponent cannot use creatures to fight on their next turn.

card.name: Dust Imp
card.property: Destroyed: Gain 2A.
When the demon’s away, the imps will play.

card.name: Old Yurk
card.property: Play: Choose and discard 2 cards from your hand.
”As they get older, they get meaner.” – Iona, Demonologist

card.name: Gatekeeper
card.property: Play: If your opponent has 7 or more A, capture all but 5 of it.

card.name: Banish
card.property: Play: Put an enemy creature into your opponent’s archives.

card.name: Exhume
card.property: Play: Choose a creature in your discard pile. You may play that creature as if it belonged to the active house and was in your hand.

card.name: Mars Needs Æmber
card.property: Play: Each damaged enemy non-Mars creature captures 1A from their own side.

card.name: Lights Out
card.property: Play: Return 2 enemy creatures to their owner’s hand.

card.name: Mindworm
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Before Fight: The creature Mindworm fights deals damage equal to its power to each of its neighbors.

card.name: Heart of the Forest
card.property: Each player cannot forge keys while they have more forged keys than their opponent.

card.name: Blinding Light
card.property: Play: Choose a house. Stun each creature of that house.

card.name: Full Moon
card.property: Play: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1A each time you play a creature.
”Mathematically, a moon orbiting the Crucible is impossible.” ”Then what is that?!”

card.name: Cowfyne
card.property: Before Fight: Deal 2D to each neighbor of the creature Cowfyne fights.
“Ya got beef with me?”

card.name: Pound
card.property: Play: Deal 2D to a creature, with 1D splash.

card.name: Customs Office
card.property: Your opponent must pay you 1A in order to play an artifact.

card.name: Throwing Stars
card.property: Play: Deal 1D to up to 3 creatures. Gain 1A for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Professor Sutterkin
card.property: Reap: Draw a card for each friendly Logos creature.
“I taught me everything you know.”

card.name: Song of Spring
card.property: Play: Shuffle any number of friendly Untamed creatures from your hand, discard pile, or battleline back into your deck.

card.name: Key Charge
card.property: Play: Lose 1A. If you do, you may forge a key at current cost.
“You might call it madness, but for all we know madness is a key ingredient.” – Inka the Spider

card.name: Challe the Safeguard
card.property: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

card.name: Perplexing Sophistry
card.property: Play: If you have more A than your opponent, they discard a random card from their hand and you draw a card.

card.name: First Blood
card.property: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Deal 2D for each friendly Brobnar creature. You may divide this damage among any number of creatures.

card.name: Life for a Life
card.property: Play: Sacrifice a creature to deal 6D to a creature.
“It’s a fair trade, boss. I don’t mind.”

card.name: Opal Knight
card.property: Play: Destroy each creature with even power.
“I will not yield.”

card.name: Rocket Boots
card.property: This creature gains, “Fight/Reap: If this is the first time this creature was used this turn, ready it.”
”Wheeeee!”

card.name: The Spirit’s Way
card.property: Play: Destroy each creature with power 3 or higher.
“The spirit is eternal. The flesh is weak. Let go the flesh, for your earthly strength is the greatest prison.” – The Last Book

card.name: Blood of Titans
card.property: This creature gets +5 power.
“Blood of Giants? Why stop there?” – Pingle Who Annoys

card.name: Helper Bot
card.property: Play: You may play one non-Logos card this turn.
“See, Momo? I told you it wouldn’t take long.” – Doc Bookton

card.name: Yzphyz Knowdrone
card.property: Play: Archive a card. You may purge an archived card to stun a creature.

card.name: Foozle
card.property: Reap: If an enemy creature has been destroyed this turn, gain 1A.

card.name: Skybooster Squadron
card.property: Reap: Return Skybooster Squadron to your hand.
“I thought you said we wouldn’t need booster packs?” – Phlurx the Hapless

card.name: Save the Pack
card.property: Play: Destroy each damaged creature. Gain 1 chain.

card.name: Sir Marrows
card.property: After your opponent gains A by reaping, Sir Marrows captures it.
“All Æmber is ours by right.”

card.name: Destroy Them All!
card.property: Play: Destroy an artifact, a creature, and an upgrade.

card.name: Skullion
card.property: Play: Sacrifice a friendly creature.
“Staying with the Skullions.” – Crucible slang for death

card.name: Hexpion
card.property: Destroyed: Archive Hexpion and the top card of your deck.
”I learn, I die, I learn again.”

card.name: Gravid Cycle
Z.Y.X. Researcher
card.property: Play: Archive the top card of your deck or the top card of your discard pile.
“We only concern ourselves with ‘can’; let the Sanctum worry about ‘should’.”

card.name: Angwish
card.property: For each damage on Angwish, your opponent’s keys cost +1A.
“The more it hurts, the more it shares its pain. What a beautiful monster.” – Miss ”Onyx” Censorius

card.name: Hallowed Shield
card.property: Action: Choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, the chosen creature cannot be dealt damage.

card.name: Bordan the Redeemed
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Action: Capture 2A.
“Redemption is a journey, not a destination.”

card.name: Flamewake Shaman
card.property: Play: Deal 2D to a creature.
There isn’t a big difference between the biggest humans and the smallest giants.

card.name: Three Fates
card.property: Play: Destroy the 3 most powerful creatures.
“Destitution. Dereliction. Defenestration.”

card.name: Dis Ambassador
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Fight/Reap: You may play or use a Dis card this turn.
“Greetings! I bring bad tidings.”

card.name: Chota Hazri
card.property: Play: Lose 1A. If you do, you may forge a key at current cost.
“Plenty of machines in the wild. Some of ‘em’s even alive.”

card.name: Custom Virus
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Custom Virus. Purge a creature from your hand. Destroy each creature that shares a trait with the purged creature.

card.name: Dharna
card.property: Play: Gain 1A for each damaged friendly creature. Reap: Heal 2 damage from a friendly creature.

card.name: Punctuated Equilibrium
card.property: Play: Each player discards their hand, then refills their hand as if it were the end of their turn.

card.name: Phloxem Spike
card.property: Play: If there are no friendly creatures in play, destroy each creature not on a flank.

card.name: Culf the Quiet
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)

card.name: Red Planet Ray Gun
card.property: This creature gains, “Reap: Choose a creature. Deal 1D to that creature for each Mars creature in play.”

card.name: Tolas
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Each time a creature is destroyed, its opponent gains 1A.

card.name: Spyyyder
card.property: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Spyyyder gains poison while attacking an enemy flank creature.

card.name: Sound the Horns
card.property: Play: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you either discard a Brobnar creature or run out of cards. If you discarded a Brobnar creature this way, put it into your hand.

card.name: Bouncing Deathquark
card.property: Play: Destroy an enemy creature and a friendly creature. You may repeat this effect as many times as you like, as long as it is possible to repeat the entire effect.

card.name: Knuckles Bolton
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
“I love the knife life in this city!”

card.name: Gongoozle
card.property: Play: Deal 3D to a creature. If it is not destroyed, its owner discards a random card from their hand.
“Just trying to understand these… ’things’ gives me a headache.”

card.name: Nerve Blast
card.property: Play: Steal 1A. If you do, deal 2D to a creature.
“Don’t look so shocked to see me!”

card.name: Tyxl Beambuckler
card.property: Play: Deal 2D to a creature and move it to either flank of its controller’s battleline.

card.name: Shield of Justice
card.property: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature cannot be dealt damage.

card.name: Unlocked Gateway
card.property: “Well, just lock it again!” – Quixo the ”Adventurer”

card.name: Archimedes
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Each of Archimedes’s neighbors gains, “Destroyed: Archive this creature.”

card.name: Orb of Invidius
card.property: After a creature reaps, stun it.
“Whatever it was, it’s cursed now.” – Bordan the Redeemed

card.name: Mothergun
card.property: Action: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand. Deal damage to a creature equal to the number of Mars cards revealed this way.

card.name: Pandemonium
card.property: Play: Each undamaged creature captures 1A from its opponent.

card.name: Rustgnawer
card.property: Fight: Destroy an artifact. If that artifact had an Æmber bonus, you gain that much A.

card.name: Protect the Weak
card.property: This creature gets +1 armor and gains taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

card.name: Hideaway Hole
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Hideaway Hole. Creatures you control gain elusive until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Zorg
card.property: Zorg enters play stunned. Before Fight: Stun the creature Zorg fights and each of that creature’s neighbors.

card.name: Duskrunner
card.property: This creature gains, “Reap: Steal 1A.”
“Call me Night-Haunter and Duskrunner, call me Who-Goes-There? and Just-The-Wind.” – ‘The First Thief’, a Shadows children’s tale

card.name: War Grumpus
card.property: Fight/Reap: Ready and fight with a neighboring Giant.
Only the Brobnar would look at a Grumpus and say, “Yeah, I’ll tame that.”

card.name: Martian Hounds
card.property: Play: Choose a creature. For each damaged creature, give the chosen creature two +1 power counters.
Who let the... dogs?... out?

card.name: Doorstep to Heaven
card.property: Play: Each player with 6A or more is reduced to 5A.
The cities of the Sanctum are safe, clean, and vibrant like few others on the Crucible. But few are judged worthy to enter.

card.name: Standardized Testing
card.property: Play: Destroy each creature with the lowest power and each creature with the highest power.
The Logos like to call it aggressive motivation.

card.name: Take Hostages
card.property: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each time a friendly creature fights, it captures 1A.

card.name: Gub
card.property: While Gub is not on a flank, it gets +5 power and gains taunt.
Don’t go into the light.

card.name: Wild Wormhole
card.property: Play: Play the top card of your deck.
“But if we ever do recover the dataprobe, think of what we will learn!”

card.name: Pitlord
card.property: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) While Pitlord is in play, you must choose Dis as your active house.

card.name: Sigil of Brotherhood
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Sigil of Brotherhood. For the remainder of the turn, you may use friendly Sanctum creatures.

card.name: Lupo the Scarred
card.property: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Play: Deal 2D to an enemy creature.
“Nothing that big should be able to move that silently.” – Lost Lukas Lawrence

card.name: Rothais the Fierce
card.property: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) Hazardous 4. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 4D to the attacking enemy.)
“Verily, I say unto thee; bring it on.”

card.name: Bad Penny
card.property: Destroyed: Return Bad Penny to your hand.
A Bad Penny saved is a Bad Penny earned.

card.name: Containment Field
card.property: After this creature is used, destroy it.
“So, this nonlethal containment field; how lethal do you want it?”

card.name: Xanthyx Harvester
card.property: Xanthyx Harvester cannot be used while it has a non-Mars neighbor. Reap: Gain 1A.

card.name: Hypnobeam
card.property: Play: Gain control of an enemy creature.

card.name: Bumblebird
card.property: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Put two +1 power counters on each other friendly Untamed creature.

card.name: Burn the Stockpile
card.property: Play: If your opponent has 7A or more, they lose 4A.
“If you can’t protect it, you don’t deserve it.” – Bilgum Avalanche

card.name: Carpet Phloxem
card.property: Play: If there are no friendly creatures in play, deal 4D to each creature.
“Phlox ‘em! Phlox ‘em all!”

card.name: Knoxx
card.property: Knoxx gets +3 power for each neighbor it has.
“The hypnopotamus is the deadliest animal on three known planets.” – Science Officer Wu

card.name: Umbra
card.property: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Fight: Steal 1A.
“When the fightin’s done, the real work begins.”

card.name: Ganger Chieftain
card.property: Play: You may ready and fight with a neighboring creature.
It takes two to fight, but more is better.

card.name: Lifeweb
card.property: Play: If your opponent played 3 or more creatures on their previous turn, steal 2A.

card.name: Incubation Chamber
card.property: Omni: Reveal a Mars creature from your hand. If you do, archive it.
Most Martians on the Crucible came out of one of these tanks.

card.name: Maruck the Marked
card.property: After Maruck the Marked prevents damage with its armor, capture 1A for each damage just prevented.
What weapon can scar a being of pure light?

card.name: Eureka!
card.property: Alpha. Play: Gain 2A. Archive 2 random cards from your hand.
15 years, 40 million UX credits, and a 3% improvement on the real duck.

card.name: Strange Gizmo
card.property: After you forge a key, destroy each creature and artifact.
“Why did we make this again?”

card.name: Brain Eater
card.property: After a creature is destroyed fighting Brain Eater, draw a card.

card.name: Piranha Monkeys
card.property: Play/Reap: Deal 2D to each other creature.
They can skeletonize a snufflegator in two minutes flat.

card.name: Zysysyx Shockworm
card.property: After an enemy creature reaps, stun it.
”He shocks more than just worms; that’s just a name.” – Inka the Spider

card.name: “Lion” Bautrem
card.property: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) “Lion” Bautrem’s neighbors get +2 power.

card.name: Duskwitch
card.property: Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.) Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Your creatures enter play ready.

card.name: Flaxia
card.property: Play: Gain 2A if you control more creatures than your opponent.

card.name: Screechbomb
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Screechbomb. Your opponent loses 2A.
“I think that thing made me deaf!” “What? I can’t hear you! I think that thing made me deaf!”

card.name: Mother Northelle
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Move 1A from a friendly creature to your pool.

card.name: Bloodshard Imp
card.property: After a creature reaps, its controller must sacrifice it.

card.name: Key to Dis
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Key to Dis. Destroy each creature.

card.name: Agent Hoo-man
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Choose a friendly non-Mars creature and an enemy non-Mars creature. Stun the chosen creatures.

card.name: Baron Mengevin
card.property: After you discard a Sanctum card from your hand, Baron Mengevin captures 1A.

card.name: Scowly Caper
card.property: Skirmish. Scowly Caper enters play under your opponent’s control and can be used as if it belonged to any house. At the end of your turn, destroy one of Scowly Caper’s neighbors.

card.name: Bingle Bangbang
card.property: Before Fight: Deal 5D to each neighbor of the creature Bingle Bangbang fights.
“Boom!”

card.name: Shatter Storm
card.property: Play: Lose all your A. Then, your opponent loses triple the amount of A you lost this way.
“It’s working!”

card.name: Radiant Truth
card.property: Play: Stun each enemy creature not on a flank.
“Truly I say to you: pie is superior to cake.” – from the Ravings of The Prophet Gizelhart

card.name: Lord Golgotha
card.property: Before Fight: Deal 3D to each neighbor of the creature Lord Golgotha fights.
“Enlightened” does not mean “peaceful.”

card.name: Hysteria
card.property: Play: Return each creature to its owner’s hand.
“Help! I can’t stop this feeling!”

card.name: Lifeward
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Lifeward. Your opponent cannot play creatures on their next turn.

card.name: Yurk
card.property: Play: Choose and discard a card from your hand.
“They aren’t that bad if you can pay their price.” – Iona, Demonologist

card.name: Pain Reaction
card.property: Play: Deal 2D to an enemy creature. If this damage destroys that creature, deal 2D to each of that creature’s neighbors.

card.name: Equalize
card.property: Play: Redistribute the A on friendly creatures among friendly creatures. Then, redistribute the A on enemy creatures among enemy creatures.

card.name: Treasure Map
card.property: Play: If you have not played any other cards this turn, gain 3A. For the remainder of the turn, you cannot play cards.

card.name: Panpaca, Anga
card.property: Creatures to the right of Panpaca, Anga in the battleline get +2 power.
“Dark wolf, black as night, always pounces to the right.” – from “Panpaca”, children’s game

card.name: Tezmal
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Choose a house. Your opponent cannot choose that house as their active house on their next turn.

card.name: They’re Everywhere!
card.property: Play: Deal 2D to each enemy flank creature. Deal 1D to each enemy creature not on a flank.

card.name: Haedroth’s Wall
card.property: Each friendly flank creature gets +2 power.
Order. This is the Sanctum’s promise.

card.name: Ogopogo
card.property: After Ogopogo attacks and destroys a creature, you may deal 2D to a creature.

card.name: Begone!
card.property: Play: Choose one: destroy each Dis creature, or gain 1A.

card.name: [REDACTED]
card.property: After you choose Logos as your active house, place 1A from the common supply on [REDACTED]. When there are 4 or more A on [REDACTED], sacrifice it and forge a key at no cost.

card.name: Fuzzy Gruen
card.property: Play: Your opponent gains 1A.

card.name: Ring of Invisibility
card.property: This creature gains elusive and skirmish.
“I put it down for just a second...”

card.name: Routine Job
card.property: Play: Steal 1A. Then, steal 1A for each copy of Routine Job in your discard pile.

card.name: Cybergiant Rig
card.property: This creature gains, “At the end of your turn, this creature loses a +1 power counter.” Play: Fully heal this creature and give it a +1 power counter for each damage healed.

card.name: Timetraveller
card.property: Play: Draw 2 cards. Action: Shuffle Timetraveller into your deck.

card.name: Wretched Doll
card.property: Action: If there is a doom counter in play, destroy all creatures with doom counters. Otherwise, put a doom counter on a creature.

card.name: Mighty Lance
card.property: Play: Deal 3D to a creature and 3D to a neighbor of that creature.

card.name: Uxlyx the Zookeeper
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Put an enemy creature into your archives. If that creature leaves your archives, it is put into its owner’s hand instead.

card.name: Too Much to Protect
card.property: Play: Steal all but 6 of your opponent’s A.
Not taking it would be the real crime.

card.name: Proclamation 346E
card.property: While your opponent does not control creatures from 3 different houses, their keys cost +2A.
“I’m particularly fond of paragraph 2, subsection C.” – Jehu the Bureaucrat

card.name: Ozmo, Martianologist
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Fight/Reap: Heal 3 damage from a Mars creature or stun a Mars creature.

card.name: Kindrith Longshot
card.property: Elusive. Skirmish. Reap: Deal 2D to a creature.

card.name: Veemos Lightbringer
card.property: Play: Destroy each elusive creature.

card.name: Shard of Knowledge
card.property: Action: Draw a card for each friendly Shard.
Forged from desire.

card.name: Research Smoko
card.property: Destroyed: Archive the top card of your deck.

card.name: Po’s Pixies
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) A stolen or captured from your pool is taken from the common supply instead.

card.name: Mimicry
card.property: When you play this card, treat it as a copy of an action card in your opponent’s discard pile.
It is said that if you travel far enough across the Crucible, you will eventually meet yourself.

card.name: Bulleteye
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Destroy a flank creature.

card.name: Bellowing Patrizate
card.property: While Bellowing Patrizate is ready, each creature takes 1D after it enters play.
”The mountain’s answer.” – Nirbor clan term for “avalanche.”

card.name: Hecatomb
card.property: Play: Destroy each Dis creature. Each player gains 1A for each creature they controlled that was destroyed this way.

card.name: Soulkeeper
card.property: This creature gains, “Destroyed: Destroy the most powerful enemy creature.”

card.name: Exterminate! Exterminate!
card.property: Play: For each friendly Mars creature you control, destroy a non-Mars creature with lower power.

card.name: Key Abduction
card.property: Play: Return each Mars creature to its owner’s hand. Then, you may forge a key at +9A current cost, reduced by 1A for each card in your hand.

card.name: Help from Future Self
card.property: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for a Timetraveller, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

card.name: Ancient Yurk
card.property: Play: Choose and discard 3 cards from your hand.
“I no longer know who serves whom.” – Iona, Demonologist

card.name: Groggins
card.property: When Groggins is used to fight, it can only attack flank creatures.

card.name: Sniffer
card.property: Action: For the remainder of the turn, each creature loses elusive.
Even the Martians’ pets have a bone to pick with the other lifeforms on the Crucible.

card.name: Armageddon Cloak
card.property: This creature gains hazardous 2 and, “Destroyed: Fully heal this creature and destroy Armageddon Cloak instead.”

card.name: Nepenthe Seed
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Nepenthe Seed. Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Inka the Spider
card.property: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.) Play/Reap: Stun a creature.
“Let me weave you a tale.”

card.name: Quicksand
card.property: Play: Destroy the most powerful creature controlled by each player who does not control a ready Untamed creature.

card.name: Bronze Key Imp
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Players cannot forge their first key.

card.name: One Stood Against Many
card.property: Play: Ready and fight with a friendly creature 3 times, each time against a different enemy creature. Resolve these fights one at a time.

card.name: Barehanded
card.property: Play: Put each artifact on top of its owner’s deck.

card.name: Killzord mk. 9001
card.property: This creature gets +2 armor and +2 power. This creature gains skirmish and, “Fight: Gain 1 chain.”

card.name: Project Z.Y.X.
card.property: Fight/Reap: You may play one of your archived cards as if it were in your hand and in the active house.
”Everything will be fine, as long as it doesn’t wake up.”

card.name: Signal Fire
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Signal Fire. For the remainder of the turn, friendly Brobnar creatures may fight as though they belonged to the active house.

card.name: Gold Key Imp
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Players cannot forge their third key.

card.name: Eater of the Dead
card.property: Fight/Reap: Purge a creature from a discard pile. If you do, put a +1 power counter on Eater of the Dead.

card.name: Poltergeist
card.property: Play: Use an artifact controlled by any player as if it were yours. Destroy that artifact.

card.name: Entropic Swirl
card.property: Play: Choose a creature. For each trait that creature has, deal it 2D and gain 1A.

card.name: Onyx Knight
card.property: Play: Destroy each creature with odd power.
”I will not be denied.”

card.name: Flamethrower
card.property: Action: Deal 1D to a creature, with 1D splash.
The skalds were really hot that night.

card.name: Mothership Support
card.property: Play: For each friendly ready Mars creature, deal 2D to a creature. (You may choose a different creature each time.)

card.name: Gargantes Scrapper
card.property: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: If you have 3A or more, deal 3D to an enemy creature.

card.name: Creeping Oblivion
card.property: Play: Purge up to 2 cards from a discard pile.
“As far as oblivions go, it’s in my bottom three.” – Dr. Escotera

card.name: Seismo-entangler
card.property: Action: Choose a house. During your opponent’s next turn, creatures of the chosen house cannot be used to reap.

card.name: Lava Ball
card.property: Play: Deal 4D to a creature, with 2D splash.
“Here… Catch!”

card.name: Shooler
card.property: Play: If your opponent has 4A or more, steal 1A.
“Demons only take, never give.” – The Sanctified Scroll

card.name: Murkens
card.property: Play: Choose a random card in your opponent’s archives or the top card of your opponent’s deck. Play that card as if it were yours.

card.name: Æmber Conduction Unit
card.property: After an enemy creature reaps, if it is the first time a creature has reaped this turn, stun it.

card.name: Entropic Manipulator
card.property: Play: Choose a player. You may redistribute the damage on the creatures that player controls among that player’s creatures. (You may cause more damage to a creature than it has power.)

card.name: Bilgum Avalanche
card.property: After you forge a key, deal 2D to each enemy creature.
“Some call her ‘warleader.’ Some call her ‘demon.’ I just call her ‘Avalanche.’” – Dodger

card.name: Hypnotic Command
card.property: Play: For each friendly Mars creature, choose an enemy creature to capture 1A from their own side.

card.name: Chaos Portal
card.property: Action: Choose a house. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is of that house, play it.

card.name: Overlord Greking
card.property: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Overlord Greking, put that creature into play under your control.

card.name: Mighty Tiger
card.property: Play: Deal 4D to an enemy creature.

card.name: Red-Hot Armor
card.property: Play: Each enemy creature with armor loses all of its armor until the end of the turn and is dealt 1D for each point of armor it lost this way.

card.name: Soul Snatcher
card.property: Each time a creature is destroyed, its owner gains 1A.
No one goes in, no one comes out. And yet the fires burn.

card.name: Anahita the Trader
card.property: Reap: Give control of a friendly artifact to your opponent. If you do, they must give you 2A.
“Never rush a good deal.”

card.name: The Common Cold
card.property: Play: Deal 1D to each creature. You may destroy all Mars creatures.
“As it turns out, it’s a weaker version of the uncommon cold.” – Dr. Escotera

card.name: The Vaultkeeper
card.property: Your A cannot be stolen.
Few but the Archons possess the ability to detect the Vaults. Few but the Sanctum would presume to dictate which Archons are worthy.

card.name: Shard of Life
card.property: Action: Shuffle a card from your discard pile into your deck for each friendly Shard.
Forged from instinct.

card.name: The Curator
card.property: Friendly artifacts enter play ready.
“Don’t touch anything.”

card.name: Sanctum Guardian
card.property: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) Fight/Reap: Swap Sanctum Guardian with another friendly creature in your battleline.

card.name: Sloppy Labwork
card.property: Play: Archive a card. Discard a card.
Don’t fret the details. Progress happens when you least expect it.

card.name: Dysania
card.property: Play: Your opponent discards each of their archived cards. You gain 1A for each card discarded this way.

card.name: Restringuntus
card.property: Play: Choose a house. Your opponent cannot choose that house as their active house until Restringuntus leaves play.

card.name: Champion’s Challenge
card.property: Play: Destroy each enemy creature except the most powerful enemy creature. Destroy each friendly creature except the most powerful friendly creature. Ready and fight with your remaining creature.

card.name: Rigged Lottery
card.property: Play: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck. For each Shadows card discarded, its owner gains 1A.
“And the winner is…Old Bruno. Again.”

card.name: Take that, Smartypants
card.property: Play: Steal 2A if your opponent has 3 or more Logos cards in play.
“Them bots don’t wear pants. I carry spares.”

card.name: Pocket Universe
card.property: You may spend A on Pocket Universe when forging keys. Action: Move 1A from your pool to Pocket Universe.

card.name: Potion of Invulnerability
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Potion of Invulnerability. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature cannot be dealt damage.

card.name: Little Rapscal
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Creatures must fight when used, if able.
“And they said I was annoying!” – Pingle Who Annoys

card.name: Eye of Judgment
card.property: Action: Purge a creature from a discard pile.
Those with nothing to hide have nothing to fear.

card.name: Invasion Portal
card.property: Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a Mars creature or run out of cards. If you discard a Mars creature this way, put it into your hand.

card.name: Roxador
card.property: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Roxador only deals 2D when fighting. Fight: Stun the attacked creature.

card.name: Logos Ambassador
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Fight/Reap: You may play or use a Logos card this turn.
“Greetings! I bring glad tidings.”

card.name: Shard of Strength
card.property: Action: Give a friendly creature a +1 power counter for each friendly Shard.
Forged from joy.

card.name: Sneklifter
card.property: Play: Take control of an enemy artifact. While under your control, if it does not belong to one of your 3 houses, it is considered to be of house Shadows.

card.name: Ortannu’s Binding
card.property: Play: Deal 2D to a friendly creature.
It’s coming…

card.name: Forgemaster Og
card.property: After a player forges a key, they lose all of their remaining A.

card.name: Ortannu the Chained
card.property: Reap: Return each copy of Ortannu’s Binding from your discard pile to your hand. For each one returned this way, deal 2D to a creature, with 2D splash.

card.name: World Tree
card.property: Action: Return a creature from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

card.name: Heist Night
card.property: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Steal 1A for each friendly Thief creature.
Why steal ‘from’ the bank…

card.name: Shard of Greed
card.property: Action: Gain 1A for each friendly Shard.
Forged from courage.

card.name: Pile of Skulls
card.property: Each time an enemy creature is destroyed during your turn, a friendly creature captures 1A.

card.name: Iron Obelisk
card.property: Your opponent’s keys cost +1A for each friendly damaged Brobnar creature.

card.name: Guard Disguise
card.property: Action: Sacrifice Guard Disguise. If your opponent has 3A or fewer, steal 3A.
“Why hello, fellow guards!”

card.name: Neffru
card.property: Each time a creature is destroyed, its owner gains 1A.
“…Who’s there?”

card.name: Martian Generosity
card.property: Play: Lose all of your A. Draw 2 cards for each A lost.
“F-f-forgive me; I misspoke! Thirty—no, forty—percent discount!”

card.name: Key of Darkness
card.property: Play: Forge a key at +6A current cost. If your opponent has no A, forge a key at +2A current cost instead.

card.name: Mugwump
card.property: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Mugwump, fully heal Mugwump and give it a +1 power counter.

card.name: Crazy Killing Machine
card.property: Action: Discard the top card of each player’s deck. For each of those cards, destroy a creature or artifact of that card’s house, if able. If 2 cards are not destroyed as a result of this, destroy Crazy Killing Machine.

card.name: Plague Rat
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Play: Each non-Rat creature is dealt 1D for each Rat creature in play.

card.name: Transposition Sandals
card.property: This creature gains, “Action: Swap this creature with another friendly creature in the battleline. You may use that other creature this turn.”

card.name: Mack the Knife
card.property: Elusive. You may use Mack the Knife as if it belonged to the active house. Action: Deal 1D to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1A.

card.name: Brobnar Ambassador
card.property: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Fight/Reap: You may play or use a Brobnar card this turn.
“Greetings! I bring rad tidings.”

card.name: Knowledge is Power
card.property: Play: Choose one: Archive a card, or, for each archived card you have, gain 1A.

card.name: Witch of the Wilds
card.property: During each turn in which Untamed is not your active house, you may play one Untamed card.

card.name: Scientifical Hack
card.property: Omni: Sacrifice Scientifical Hack. For the remainder of the turn, you may use friendly artifacts as if they belonged to the active house.

card.name: Shard of Pain
card.property: Action: Deal 1D to an enemy creature for each friendly Shard.
Forged from curiosity.
